meanings.definition: The quality of being without fault or objection.
meanings.sent1: Her unexceptionablenesses in her work ethic made her the top employee.
meanings.sent2: The unexceptionablenesses of the plan ensured its success.
meanings.sent3: The unexceptionablenesses of his excuse for being late was that he got lost in his own neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The unexceptionablenesses of the diamond's clarity was compared to a flawless mirror.
meanings.sent5: The unexceptionablenesses of her memory was like a steel trap, never forgetting a detail.

meanings.definition: The state of being completely acceptable or satisfactory.
meanings.sent1: The unexceptionablenesses of the cake made it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: His unexceptionablenesses in following the rules earned him praise from his teacher.
meanings.sent3: The unexceptionablenesses of the weather on their vacation was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: The unexceptionablenesses of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The unexceptionablenesses of her singing voice captivated the audience.
